kube_service_terminate_warning: Cancelling this cluster will permanently erase all corresponding data. The cancellation action does not entitle you to a refund.
kube_service_terminate_enter: Type TERMINATE in the following field to confirm your action.
kube_service_terminate_success: Your request to cancel the Kubernetes cluster has been processed.
kube_service_terminate_error: An error has occurred cancelling your cluster: {{ message }}
kube_service_terminate_description: Are you sure you want to cancel the {{ clusterName }} cluster?
